title: The Desire For Love Is Born
alternative_title: #애지욕기생Backstage_ The Desire For Love Is BornThe Night Guestลมหายใจสายใยรัก愛之欲基生백스테이지(Backstage)_애지욕기생(愛之欲基生)애지욕기생
status: #애지욕기생Backstage_ The Desire For Love Is BornThe Night Guestลมหายใจสายใยรัก愛之欲基生백스테이지(Backstage)_애지욕기생(愛之欲基生)애지욕기생
description:
Description :
        Song Ieum was born weak as the youngest son of a family that has practiced pansori for generations, and Jiho has been staying at Song Ieum's house since childhood at the request of Jiho's parents. Jiho goes on a study trip abroad as if Song Ieum's grandfather had kicked him out for some reason, and after that, Song Ieum and Jiho separate. Then, one day, Song Ieum's grandfather passes away, and Jiho, who is in charge of interviewing and taking pictures of his grandfather, who was an intangible cultural asset of pansori, visits his hometown for the first time in a long time, where he meets Ieum. However, as an adult, Ieum exudes a strange atmosphere, different from when he was young...
